manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5 IN 1 OFFICE DESK LAMP: USB Rechargeable + USB Charging Port + Pen/Phone Holder + 70 LED Super Bright !

3 Light Colors : White( 6500K ), 4000K (Natural) , 3000K (Warm) 3 different lighting modes to choose, a single point will be on, click again to switch the lighting mode, from 3000K(warm light) to 4000K (soft light) to 6500K (white light) to switch, the last is off, we can use according to the different environment, such as:Use white light for work, learn to use soft light, warm light for sleep or home, and with light memory function, you can restore the setting of the last use, reduce frequent adjustment, very flexible and practical

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light turns off by itself even if I just turned it on
reviews.reviewText: When I first got it , the light worked great, but found out it turns off by itself. Only after I bought it did I find out that there is a lithium battery unit. Would not buy it again. So frustrated with unit. I nearly feel that it's possessed. Plugged in but still turns itself off 3 min later. NOT A GOOD DESK LAMP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I wished it came in black, but it didn't. I ordered the white lamp. I really like the design and the amount of light it puts out. You can charge it and then not need to plug in. I discovered (after I received it) that the lamp is disposable. Once the bulb burns out...it is not replaceable. It states to just throw the lamp away. :( It has a charger, so I can charge my phone and a stand for the phone. I think I am going to love this lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was great until it started to randomly shut off with no warning. Love the storage but will be getting something else.Edit: so I've discovered unplugging the lamp and plugging it back in fixed the issue I had previously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars lamp is useless after few uses
reviews.reviewText: had this lamp for over a year and after a few uses (i didn't use it that often) the battery power of the lamp dies insanely quick. It didn't matter if I leave the lamp plugged in or if it was fully charged, it dies within 5 or so minutes. and this was early on when I just received the lamp. I was hoping it would somehow improve over time but unfortunately it just got worse and now I just use it to store a couple of my nail items in it. the lamp's brightness and settings is nice - when it decides to work- but otherwise its best to spend your money on a lamp that wont die quickly (and while its plugged in too which is the baffling part).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little light
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is perfect for my son’s desk. He loves the fact that he can reposition the lamp to where he needs light for the moment, along with the different brightness modes. Having a built in pen/pencil holder keeps the desk less cluttered too. It’s perfect for his needs 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Lamp But… Turning off issue
reviews.reviewText: I bough this product in the middle of April but didn’t put it to use until the end of July in a new apartment. It has been a really good lamp but a couple months ago I noticed it would turn off randomly while being plugged in. Recently, I cannot have it on for more than five minutes without it turning off and it won’t turn back on after doing so. I really do like this lamp for it’s different colour settings and brightness options but it’s becoming really annoying to try to do written work on my desk since my overhead light is behind me and my shadow is cast across my desk. It’s phone stand is great for watching videos while my phone is charging and the usb port does work as far as I’ve checked but I have a power strip by my desk and my cords are long so I don’t use the built in usb often and can’t attest to it’s quality. Other than the issue with it shutting off, this is a great lamp but I cannot recommend it because of that issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lamp works well and has great features. It has plenty of space for writing utensils and a charging port for your phone which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
